item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The US yield curve steepened sharply amid growing calls for the Federal Reserve to start cutting interest rates as soon as next week. item.title: The Accounting Flaw at the Heart of ‘Financed Emissions’
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- A frequent critique of carbon accounting is that Scope 3 emissions, those that arise from a company’s customers and supply chains, are essentially double-counted. Since one company’s Scope 3 emissions are comprised of other companies’ Scope 1 emissions, which are those that occur from...
